home.title: Home
home.intro: Easily manage your finances and reach your financial goals with the Personal Finance Tracker. Hereâ€™s what you can do:

multipleAccounts.title: Multiple Accounts
multipleAccounts.description: Log in to create and manage multiple bank accounts. You can even share access with others, while retaining full control over your accounts.

seamlessTransactions.title: Seamless Transactions
seamlessTransactions.description: Send and receive money effortlessly between accounts.

expenseTracking.title: Expense & Income Tracking
expenseTracking.description: Review all your expenses and income with detailed sorting options by date, amount, or category.

secureEnvironment.title: Secure & Managed Environment
secureEnvironment.description: With bank administrators on hand to monitor accounts and ensure security, your data is always safe.

home.getStarted: Get started today to take control of your finances!
